headline: Bank Of America Expands Rewards And Art Services As Valuation Gap Persists
summary: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) has introduced BofA Rewards, a new no fee rewards program aimed at expanding benefits to tens of millions of clients. The bank has also launched an Art Consulting service for Private Bank and Merrill wealth clients, focusing on art as an alternative asset. Bank of America, trading at $53.36, is rolling out these updates as it looks to deepen ties with both mass market and wealth clients. The stock shows a mixed return profile, with a 1 year return of 18.7%, a 3...
